menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: The Fitness menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product of active and healthy people. This is a completely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu 'Lean'
menu.descr: The Lean menu is a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein from tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to the restaurant!
